description: As the Council prepares for full public release of historical BCI data, Lenart Kova intervenes. Drawing on his belief in redemption and social healing, he overrides the protocol and directs the crisis into the Halden Echoes oracle instead.

The Halden Echoes oracle unexpectedly broadcasts alternate life stories to every resident—visions of how their lives might have unfolded under different scores or choices. The revelation stuns the city, sparking intense debate and emotional responses.
Community gatherings and public confession circles spring up throughout Stenograd as citizens share and discuss their alternate histories, forging new relationships and mutual understanding.

Council members, including Rada, Daria, and Oksana, participate in a live citywide broadcast, publicly reflecting on their own alternate visions and past BCI manipulations. Their admission prompts broader conversations about accountability.
Stenograd formally curtails the BCI’s authority following a citywide debate. New participatory justice frameworks are launched, emphasizing transparency and citizen oversight.
